record.dc:title: 34Ms32 McKee Island Site, Marshall County, Alabama. Burial #27. Associated artifacts include F.S. #37 (bowl), #38 (copper band around left arm), #41 (large copper spangles near right pelvis), #42 (small copper spangles arcoss knees), #57 (copper ear plugs at left ear and under head) and #60 (glass beads around neck).
record.dc:creator: C. G. Wilder
record.wpa:narrative: Burial #27 is in poor condition. Associated artifacts include F.S. #37 (bowl), #38 (copper band around left arm), #41 (large copper spangles near right pelvis), #42 (small copper spangles arcoss knees), #57 (copper ear plugs at left ear and under head) and #60 (glass beads around neck).
